definition: pan mee, aka banmian, a Hakka noodle soup dish, popular in Malaysia
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Are the surface of the boards and holes completely dry after deburr process?
sentences.chinese: 去毛刺后，板面与孔是否完全干燥？

sentences.english: Mohinga, rice noodles in fish soup, is widely considered to be Burma's national dish.
sentences.chinese: 鱼板面，即鱼汤米粉，被普遍认为是缅甸的大众食物。

sentences.english: A colour clouding method for measuring surface curvature using white light is given.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了用白光获得板面曲率的显色云纹方法。

sentences.english: Board MDF coated with melamine surface colors.
sentences.chinese: 板面为高密度板，外覆三聚氰胺面，颜色可选。

sentences.english: The keel arranged on the board is in a radiation shape from the tube head to the outside;
sentences.chinese: 设置在上述板面上的龙骨呈从管头向外边的放射状。

sentences.english: It is adopted in this study to get the normal and planar anisotropy of the sheet metals.
sentences.chinese: 本研究将利用此法求得板材的板厚及板面异方性。

sentences.english: In this paper, the assemblage of the traffic sign plate is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了交通标志板面装配化这一概念。

definition: knife-shaved noodles (pared or shaved into strips), a Shanxi specialty
to make noodles by pulling out dough/hand-pulled noodles
noodles either made of buckwheat or sorghum
Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
